text: Your ripple carries light farther than you can see.
Every flame begins with a single spark of giving.
Be the first ripple today — the stream awaits you.
In the mandala of humanity, your flame is a sacred point of light.
Generosity is not loss — it is expansion into the infinite.
When you give, the universe whispers back in blessings.
Your ripple joins countless others, weaving a river of devotion.
Sacred numbers guide your path: 9, 27, 108 — each a step of light.
The flame you kindle today may guide someone through their night.
